original_solution_mapping.L1: Billy has already run 6 miles because 1 plus 1 plus 1 plus 1 plus 1 plus plus 1 equals 6
original_solution_mapping.L2: Tiffany has already run 7 miles because 2 plus 2 plus 2 plus 1/3 plus 1/3 plus 1/3 equals <<2+2+2+1/3+1/3+1/3=7>>7
original_solution_mapping.L3: Billy has to run 1 mile to tie Tiffany because 7 minus 6 equals 1.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1567.
    Returns: the number of miles Billy has to run on Saturday to tie Tiffany.
    """
    # L1
    miles_per_day_billy_early = 1 # Billy runs 1 mile each day
    billy_miles_so_far = miles_per_day_billy_early + miles_per_day_billy_early + miles_per_day_billy_early + miles_per_day_billy_early + miles_per_day_billy_early + miles_per_day_billy_early

    # L2
    miles_per_day_tiffany_early = 2 # Tiffany runs 2 miles each day
    miles_per_day_tiffany_late = Fraction(1, 3) # Tiffany runs a 1/3 of a mile each day
    tiffany_miles_so_far = miles_per_day_tiffany_early + miles_per_day_tiffany_early + miles_per_day_tiffany_early + miles_per_day_tiffany_late + miles_per_day_tiffany_late + miles_per_day_tiffany_late

    # L3
    miles_billy_needs_to_run = tiffany_miles_so_far - billy_miles_so_far

    # FA
    answer = miles_billy_needs_to_run
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Billy has already run {billy_miles_so_far} miles because {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} equals {billy_miles_so_far}

Tiffany has already run {tiffany_miles_so_far} miles because {miles_per_day_tiffany_early} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_early} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_early} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_late} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_late} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_late} equals <<{miles_per_day_tiffany_early}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_early}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_early}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_late}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_late}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_late}={tiffany_miles_so_far}>>{tiffany_miles_so_far}
Billy has to run {miles_billy_needs_to_run} mile to tie Tiffany because {tiffany_miles_so_far} minus {billy_miles_so_far} equals {miles_billy_needs_to_run}.
